name: Bound (itch) (norstin)
description:
Fitted with a prosthetic jumping boot, a cat journeys to the top of a mountain to request the aid of a great spirit in hopes that it will save the village from the coming corruption.



A potentially rage-inducing platformer inspired by Jump King.

Hold space to charge your first jump, using A & D to aim. 



Made in one week for the Whisker Jam 2022!
My wife drew the cute image in the intro, I did everything else :)
